starfleet_message: To Captain Picard, USS Enterprise-D: Investigate the following situation. A distress call has been received from a Federation science station orbiting Epsilon IV.
mission_description: Investigate the cause of the distress call and ensure the safety of the science team. Provide assistance and stabilize the station’s operations.

dialogue_tree.line: Captain, we're approaching the coordinates. A distress call has been received from a Federation science station orbiting Epsilon IV.

options.label: Open hailing frequencies.
options.crew_reply: Commander Riker: 'Channel open, Captain. No response yet, but telemetry is faint.'

options.label: Raise shields.
options.crew_reply: Lt. Commander Data: 'Shields up and holding steady, Captain.'

options.label: Hold position.
options.crew_reply: Chief O'Brien: 'Maintaining current course and speed.'

dialogue_tree.line: Sensors are detecting fluctuations near the target region.

options.label: Divert auxiliary power to sensors.
options.crew_reply: Lt. Commander Data: 'Aye, Captain. Signal resolution improving.'

options.label: Maintain current scan pattern.
options.crew_reply: Counselor Troi: 'No significant change, Captain.'

options.label: Begin detailed life-sign analysis.
options.crew_reply: Chief O'Brien: 'Multiple faint readings, Captain. Possibly survivors.'

dialogue_tree.line: Whatever caused the anomaly appears to be stabilizing. Awaiting orders.

options.label: Dispatch an away team.
options.crew_reply: Chief O'Brien: 'Away team ready, Captain.'

options.label: Maintain orbit.
options.crew_reply: Counselor Troi: 'Holding position at safe range.'

options.label: Withdraw to a safer distance.
options.crew_reply: Commander Riker: 'Understood. Adjusting course accordingly.'

debriefs.text: Starfleet Command commends the crew of the Enterprise-D for successfully completing the a distress call has been received from a federation science station orbiting epsilon iv. mission with professionalism and precision.

starfleet_message: To Captain Picard, USS Enterprise-D: Investigate the following situation. A Starfleet convoy en route to Starbase 12 has encountered a navigational hazard.
mission_description: Assist the convoy in clearing the hazard and ensure all ships reach their destination safely.

dialogue_tree.line: Captain, we're approaching the coordinates. A Starfleet convoy en route to Starbase 12 has encountered a navigational hazard.

options.label: Open hailing frequencies.
options.crew_reply: Chief O'Brien: 'Channel open, Captain. No response yet, but telemetry is faint.'

options.label: Raise shields.
options.crew_reply: Lt. Commander Data: 'Shields up and holding steady, Captain.'

options.label: Hold position.
options.crew_reply: Lt. Worf: 'Maintaining current course and speed.'

dialogue_tree.line: Sensors are detecting fluctuations near the target region.

options.label: Divert auxiliary power to sensors.
options.crew_reply: Lt. Commander Data: 'Aye, Captain. Signal resolution improving.'

options.label: Maintain current scan pattern.
options.crew_reply: Ensign Crusher: 'No significant change, Captain.'

options.label: Begin detailed life-sign analysis.
options.crew_reply: Lt. Worf: 'Multiple faint readings, Captain. Possibly survivors.'

dialogue_tree.line: Whatever caused the anomaly appears to be stabilizing. Awaiting orders.

options.label: Dispatch an away team.
options.crew_reply: Lt. Worf: 'Away team ready, Captain.'

options.label: Maintain orbit.
options.crew_reply: Ensign Crusher: 'Holding position at safe range.'

options.label: Withdraw to a safer distance.
options.crew_reply: Chief O'Brien: 'Understood. Adjusting course accordingly.'

debriefs.text: Starfleet Command commends the crew of the Enterprise-D for successfully completing the a starfleet convoy en route to starbase 12 has encountered a navigational hazard. mission with professionalism and precision.
